welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Juvisy-sur-Orge! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and lively atmosphere. Take some time to explore and soak in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speeds and time restrictions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, with seven sub-terminals serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
